The trial design demonstrate safety effectiveness Blazer® Open-Irrigated Ablation Catheter non-inferior safety effectiveness control catheter , treatment drug refractory , recurrent , symptomatic , paroxysmal atrial fibrillation . The control catheters open-irrigated radiofrequency ablation catheter approve United States treatment drug refractory recurrent symptomatic paroxysmal atrial fibrillation , use compatible three-dimensional electroanatomic mapping system .
